item.title: Fastdup: An Underrated Tool to Manage, Clean & Curate Visual Data at Scale on a Single CPU - For Free.
item.description: ‚úÖ Motivation As a data scientist, you might be tempted to jump into modeling as soon as you can. I mean, that’s the fun part, right? But trust me, if you skip straight to modeling without taking the time to really understand the problem and analyze the data, you’re setting yourself up for failure. I’ve been there. You might feel like a superstar, but you’ll have with a model that doesn’t work ü§¶‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è.

item.title: TIMM at the Edge: How to Deploy 645 PyTorch Image Models on Android with TorchScript and Flutter
item.description: .notice{padding:18px;line-height:24px;margin-bottom:24px;border-radius:4px;color:#6c757d;background:#e7f2fa}.notice p:last-child{margin-bottom:0}.notice-title{margin:-18px -18px 12px;padding:4px 18px;border-radius:4px 4px 0 0;font-weight:700;color:#fff;background:#6ab0de}.notice.warning .notice-title{background:rgba(217,83,79,.9)}.notice.warning{background:#fae2e2}.notice.info .notice-title{background:#f0b37e;}.notice.info{background:#fff2db}.notice.note .notice-title{background:#6ab0de}.notice.note{background:#e7f2fA}.notice.tip .notice-title{background:rgba(92,184,92,.8)}.notice.tip{background:#e6f9e6}.icon-notice{display:inline-flex;align-self:center;margin-right:8px}.icon-notice img,.icon-notice svg{height:1em;width:1em;fill:currentColor}.icon-notice img,.icon-notice.baseline svg{top:0.125em;position:relative} info This blog post is still a work in progress. If you require further clarifications before the contents are finalized, please get in touch with me here, on LinkedIn, or Twitter. üî• Motivation You finally got into a Kaggle competition. You found a getting-started notebook written by a Kaggle Grandmaster and immediately trained a state-of-the-art (SOTA) image classification model.
